title: Automated Text Classification for Analyzing MOOC Learner Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical application skills through large-scale learner engagement in mobile environments using personal devices and project-based assessments

learning_goals: A DNN-based text classification model can automatically categorize MOOC learner reviews into semantic categories with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain how to understand the characteristics of RCNN models and apply them to learner experience analysis
Based on analysis results, learners can propose specific design interventions for improving MOOCs

resources: Class Central Sample Dataset (For Learning Purposes)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
